newsitem.title: USA: Sky Games issues 6.9 mln shars to Harrah's.
newsitem.headline: Sky Games issues 6.9 mln shars to Harrah's.

text.p: Sky Games International Inc said Monday it issued 6.9 million shares to Harrah's Entertainment Inc in connection with its merger with Interactive Entertainment Ltd.
The shares it issued represents a 38.6 percent stake in Sky Games, it said.

Interactive is a joint venture betweeen Sky Games and Harrah's and in which Sky Games previously owned an 80 percent stake. Interactive develops remote control gaming software for use on international airline flights.

Sky Games said it has been advised that Harrah's, a hotel and casino operator in Las Vegas, holds the shares in Sky Games for investment purposes. It said Harrah's intends to evaluate the investment and may increase or decrease the stake "as circumstances require."
